title: Scaffolding-Based Project Learning for Understanding Double-Entry Bookkeeping

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, with project execution reflecting real business scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of double-entry bookkeeping (debit/credit concepts) with 85% accuracy through three-tiered scaffolding activities
Learners can record transaction examples in everyday language with 90% accuracy using a simplified accounting terminology system
Learners can perform at least three real-world business simulation projects in a PBL environment and analyze financial statement changes with 80% accuracy
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
